page.title: 16THE NEWS IS AWFUL
page.content: I live in {Porthcawl}and travel to school every day. I don't watch the tele much because the news is so awful. We seem to live in luxury compared to people in places like { {Ethiopia,}they are starving and although we have raised millions of pounds to help we don't seem to be getting very far. President Reagan and Mr. Gorbachov have just finished their talks and they seem to be friendly but are they? They could blow the whole world up if they had a nuclear war! People are into drugs, smoking and drinking and more nad more people have cancer. One good thing medical technology is improving all the time but without disease we would be over populated and then there would be lots of murders. I don't know where we'll end up. SARAH THOMAS
